title: Ticket #6754: Java on Mac OSX
description: The Java tests are failing on Mac OSX. It appears that java does not normally reside at /usr/bin/java. Figure out where the new default location for Java on Mac OS is. Perhaps, the param table needs to be updated so that it will find the java automatically on Mac OS.
